fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
The easiest way to purchase $YFI is through a decentralized exchange like Uniswap. If you trade from $ETH into $YFI there will be minimal slippage.
You can also buy $YFI on Binance, Coinbase, Huobi, Okex, FTX and Poloniex. Always be cautious when using centralized exchanges.
